DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial determine whether cervical ripen isosorbide mononitrate reduce caesarean section woman post term pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Reduction Cesareans Nitric Oxide ( NO ) Donors Post Term Pregnancies
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose trial determine whether cervical ripen 40 mg isosorbide mononitrate give intravaginally 41+0 , 41+2 41+4 week reduce cesarean section nullipara post term pregnancy . Treatments administer midwifes maternity ward , woman allow go back home case Bishop score < 6 . Otherwise labor induce oxytocin . If undelivered 41+5 , woman Bishop score < 6 induced prostaglandin accord local protocol .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age > = 18 year old TAS > = 95 mmHg Singleton Nulliparity Term > = 41 week + 0 day Bishop score < = 5 Vertex presentation Intact membranes No contraindication study treatment No maternal fetal disease could indicate immediate labor induction Written inform consent Exclusion criterion : Multiple pregnancy Multiparity Term < 41 week Bishop score > 5 Breech presentation Rupture membranes Previous cesarean Indication immediate labor induction Contraindications isosorbide mononitrate No coadministration antihypertensive drug No social security
